definitions.definition: A form of cement , made from linseed oil and whiting , used to fix panes of glass .
Any of a range of similar substances .

subdefinitions.definition: An oxide of tin, or of lead and tin, used in polishing glass, etc.
A fine cement of lime only, used by plasterers.

definitions.definition: ( golf , colloquial ) A golf ball made of composition and not gutta-percha .

main_definition: A form of cement , made from linseed oil and whiting , used to fix panes of glass .
secondary_definitions: Any of a range of similar substances .
( golf , colloquial ) A golf ball made of composition and not gutta-percha .

definitions.definition: Alternative form of puttee ( “ strip of cloth wound round the leg ” ) .

main_definition: Alternative form of puttee ( “ strip of cloth wound round the leg ” ) .
